attributes.action: Ban all super trawlers from UK waters
attributes.additional_details: To protect our sea beds and marine resources from "factory style" fishing methods.
attributes.background: Ban all super trawlers from UK waters

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban Supertrawlers from UK waters after leaving the EUs Common Fisheries Policy
